menu_description.describe: Describe column's values (Top unique values, Min, Max, Sum, STD, Var,...)
menu_description.filter: Defining custom Filtering for the main spreadsheet, Charts, ...
menu_description.build: Creating a/multi new column based on the existing columns or random values
menu_description.reshape: Create a new grid using either PIVOT table, Aggregations w/ GroupBy or Transpose.
menu_description.charts: Plot chart (line, bar, scatter, pie, wordcloud,...)
menu_description.heatmap: Presenting heatmap for numerical values in the main table. 'Overall' will calculate over the min/max of every column whereas 'By Col' will calculate each column individually by its min/max.
menu_description.highlight_dtypes: Highlight columns based on pandas dtypes. For dtype's name hover the mouse over column name.
menu_description.highlight_missings: Highlight any cells which contain "nan" values (or in the case of strings, empty strings or strings consisting only of spaces). Also, a "!" will be prepended to any column header which contains missing values.
menu_description.highlight_outliers: Highlight any cells for numeric columns which surpass the upper or lower bounds of a custom outlier computation. Lower bounds outliers will be on a red scale and upper bounds outliers will be on a blue scale. Also, a "★" will be prepended to any column header which contains outliers.
menu_description.highlight_range: Highlight any cells for numeric columns which match any of the filters for equals, greater than or less than. Click "Highlight Range" to update filters.
menu_description.instances: Show existing datasets loaded to D-Tale.
menu_description.code: Code snippet of commands performed upon your data to produce this grid.
menu_description.export: Download DataFrame as CSV or TSV
menu_description.about: Link to the source code repository, documentation
menu_description.shutdown: Close D-Tale and all other open datasets without save. Do you want to export DataFrame?
menu_description.editing: Update cells to anything you'd like. Press "Enter" to confirm or "Esc" to exit. Invalid types will throw errors. Protected values are "nan" & "inf".
menu_description.xarray_conversion: Convert your pandas.Dataframe to an xarray.Dataset by selecting columns as an index. Once this is complete you'll be able to view different slices of your data by choosing index values.
menu_description.upload: Load CSV/TSV files, CSV/TSV/JSON from the web or sample datasets to D-Tale using pandas.read_csv(), pandas.read_json() or customized loaders.
menu_description.duplicates: Remove duplicate columns/values from your data as well as extract duplicates out into separate instances.
menu_description.theme: Toggle between light & dark themes for your viewing pleasure (only affects grid, not popups or charts).
menu_description.pps: PPS is an asymmetric, data-type-agnostic score that can detect linear or non-linear relationships between two columns. The score ranges from 0 (no predictive power) to 1 (perfect predictive power). It can be used as an alternative to the correlation (matrix). WARNING: This could take a while to load.
menu_description.low_variance_1: Show flags on column headers where both these conditions are true:
menu_description.low_variance_2: Count of unique values / column size < 10%
menu_description.low_variance_3: Count of most common value / Count of second most common value > 20
menu_description.low_variance_4: You can view variance information by clicking the "Variance" option in the column menu.
menu_description.xarray_dim_des: View individual xarray dimensions. You are currently viewing:

filter_page.context_variables_des:
These are initialized via the context_vars argument to dtale.show(), ex: dtale.show(df, context_vars={"{'foo': [1, 2, 3]}"})
They can be referenced in filters by prefixing the variable name with {"'@'"}, ex:Col in @footo only show rows where {"'Col'"} is in list {"'foo'"}

column_menu.Name: Name
column_menu.numeric: Add, subtract, multiply or divide two columns of numeric data or static numeric values.
column_menu.string: Concatenate columns together to form a string.
column_menu.bins: Convert numeric data into bins using pandas cut or qcut functions.
column_menu.datetime: Pull out properties (minute, hour, time...) or convert to date representations (month-end, month-start, year-end...) using datatime columns.
column_menu.encoder: Encode categorical data as indicators using OneHotEncoder, OrdinalEncoder, LabelEncoder or FeatureHasher.
column_menu.random: Build a column of random data for different data types using range rules.
column_menu.similarity: Calculate string similarity distances between two columns using one of the following  algorithms: Levenshtein, Damerau-Leveneshtein, Jaro-Winkler, Jaccard Index.
column_menu.standardize: Standardize a numeric column for outliers using one of the following scalars from sklearn: RobustScalar, QuantileTransformer, PowerTransformer.
column_menu.type_conversion: Convert columns of one type to another.
column_menu.transform: Transform numeric data of one column by grouping on others and applying an aggregation (sum, mean, count...).
column_menu.winsorize: Remove outliers in your column by replacing values that fall at or below the lowest percentile with the maximum value in that group and replacing values that fall at or above highest percentile with the minimum value of that group.
column_menu.zscore_normalize: Normalize a numeric column by turning it into z-scores. Simply subtract it's mean and divide by it's standard deviation.
column_menu.cleaning: Clean string data of punctuation, numbers & other erroneous data using different functions.
column_menu.diff: Calculate differences between rows using Pandas` diff() function.
column_menu.No conversion mappings available for dty: No conversion mappings available for dtype:
column_menu.Add Space Between Word and Numbers: Add Space Between Word and Numbers
column_menu.Update Space Values to Empty String: Update Space Values to Empty String
column_menu.Title: Title

cleaning_descriptions.drop_multispace: Replace sequences of multiple spaces in the rows i.e. "Foo    Bar" > "Foo Bar"
cleaning_descriptions.drop_punctuation: Remove punctuation characters !"#$%&'|()*+,-./:;<=>?@[]^_`{|}~ from the text. i.e. "foo." > "foo"
cleaning_descriptions.stopwords: Remove a user-defined stop words from rows by entering a comma-separated string of stop words below
cleaning_descriptions.nltk_stopwords: Remove stop words based on NLTK library
cleaning_descriptions.drop_numbers: Remove numbers from the content. i.e. "Foo123" > "Foo"
cleaning_descriptions.keep_alpha: Remove characters which are not part of the standard alphabet or spaces. i.e. "BÀr. @123 foo" > "BÀrfoo"
cleaning_descriptions.normalize_accents: Normalize accent characters with normal characters i.e. "BÀr foö" > "BAr foo'"
cleaning_descriptions.drop_all_space: Remove all spaces in the row i.e. "New York" > "NewYork"
cleaning_descriptions.add_word_number_space: Add space between words and/or numbers. i.e. "Berlin123" > "Berlin 123"
cleaning_descriptions.drop_repeated_chars: Removes characters which are repeated within a value i.e. "BBerlin" > "Berlin"
cleaning_descriptions.hidden_chars: Removes characters that cannot be printed to your screen using string.printable
cleaning_descriptions.replace_hyphen_w_space: Replaces any hyphens (unicode or otherwise) with a space

duplicate.Remove columns that contain the same dat: Remove columns that contain the same data.
duplicate.Remove columns with the same name (case-: Remove columns with the same name (case-insensitive)
duplicate.Remove duplicate rows based on a subset: Remove duplicate rows based on a subset of columns.
duplicate.Show all duplicates data or duplicate da: Show all duplicates data or duplicate data for a specific value.

upload.Drop data files here to upload, or click: Drop data files here to upload, or click to select files

about.Your version is currently out of sync wi: Your version is currently out of sync with PyPi.

menu_description.describe: 描述每列的值（最上面的唯一值，最小值，最大值，总和，STD，变量，...）。
menu_description.filter: 为主要电子表格，图表，等...定义自定义筛选。
menu_description.build: 根据现有列或随机值创建一个/多个新列。
menu_description.reshape: 使用PIVOT表，或具有GroupBy的聚合，或转置来创建新网格。
menu_description.charts: 绘图（折线图，条形图，散点图，饼图，wordcloud等）。
menu_description.heatmap: 在主表中显示数值的热图。 “总体”将计算每列的最小值/最大值，而“按颜色”将根据其最小值/最大值分别计算每一列。
menu_description.highlight_dtypes: 高亮显示基于pandas dtypes的列。将鼠标悬停在列名称上以显示dtype的名称。
menu_description.highlight_missings: 高亮显示任何包含"nan"值的单元格（如果是字符串，则显示空字符串或仅由空格组成的字符串）。并且， ”！”将被添加到包含缺少值的任何列标题之前。
menu_description.highlight_outliers: 高亮显示数字列超出自定义离群值计算上限或下限的所有单元格。下界离群值将为红色标度，上限离群值将为蓝色标度。此外，任何包含异常值的列标题都将以“★”开头。
menu_description.highlight_range: 突出显示匹配任何过滤器（等于或大于或小于）的数字列的所有单元格。单击“突出显示范围”以更新过滤器。
menu_description.instances: 显示加载到D-Tale的现有数据集。
menu_description.code: 对数据执行以生成此网格的命令代码片段。
menu_description.shutdown: 关闭D-Tale和所有其他打开的数据集而不保存。您是否要导出DataFrame？
menu_description.editing: 将单元更新为您想要的任何内容。按“ Enter”确认，或按“ Esc”退出。无效的类型将引发错误。受保护的值为“ nan”和“ inf”。
menu_description.xarray_conversion: 通过选择列作为索引将pandas.Dataframe转换为xarray.Dataset。完成此操作后，您可以通过选择索引值来查看数据的不同部分。
menu_description.upload: 使用pandas.read_csv()，pandas.read_json()或自定义的加载器将网络上或示例数据集中的CSV/TSV文件，CSV/TSV/JSON加载到D-Tale。
menu_description.duplicates: 从数据中删除重复的列/值，并将重复的数据提取到单独的实例中。
menu_description.theme: 在浅色和深色主题之间切换，以获取愉悦的观看效果（仅影响网格，不影响弹出窗口或图表）。
menu_description.pps: PPS是一个非对称的，与数据类型无关的评分，可以检测两列之间的线性或非线性关系。分数范围从0（无预测能力）到1（完美的预测能力）。它可以用作相关性（矩阵）的替代方法。警告：这可能需要一段时间才能加载。
menu_description.low_variance_1: 在满足以下两个条件的情况下，在列标题上显示标志：。
menu_description.low_variance_3: 最常用值计数/次常用值计数>20。
menu_description.low_variance_4: 您可以通过单击列菜单中的“差异”选项来查看差异信息。
menu_description.xarray_dim_des: 查看各个xarray尺寸。您当前正在查看：

filter_page.regex usage (search for substrings 'foo': 正则表达式的用法（搜索子字符串“ foo”或“ bar”）
filter_page.context_variables_des:
这些通过dtale.show（）的context_vars参数初始化，例如：dtale.show(df, context_vars={"{'foo': [1, 2, 3]}"})
可以在过滤器中引用它们，方法是在变量名前加上{"'@'"}，例如：Col in @foo仅显示{"'Col'"}在列表{"'foo'"}中的行。

column_menu.Name: 名字
column_menu.numeric: 加，减，乘或除两列数值数据或静态数值。
column_menu.string: 将列连接在一起以形成字符串。
column_menu.bins: 使用pandas cut或qcut函数将数字数据转换为bin。
column_menu.datetime: 使用datatime列提取属性（分钟，小时，时间...）或转换为日期表示形式（月末，月初，年末...）。
column_menu.encoder: 使用OneHotEncoder，OrdinalEncoder，LabelEncoder或FeatureHasher将分类数据编码为指示符。
column_menu.random: 使用范围规则为不同的数据类型构建一列随机数据。
column_menu.similarity: 使用以下算法之一计算两列之间的字符串相似距离：Levenshtein，Damerau-Leveneshtein，Jaro-Winkler，Jaccard Index。
column_menu.standardize: 使用来自sklearn的以下标量之一标准化离群值的数字列：RobustScalar，QuantilTransformer，PowerTransformer。
column_menu.type_conversion: 将一种类型的列转换为另一种类型。
column_menu.transform: 通过对另一列进行分组并应用聚合（求和，平均值，计数...）来转换一列的数值数据。
column_menu.winsorize: 通过用该组中的最大值替换等于或低于最低百分比的值，并用该组中的最小值替换等于或高于最高百分比的值，来删除列中的异常值。
column_menu.zscore_normalize: 通过将数字列转换为z分数来对其进行规范化。只需减去它的平均值，再除以它的标准差即可。
column_menu.cleaning: 使用不同的功能清除标点符号，数字和其他错误数据的字符串数据。
column_menu.diff: 使用Pandas的diff()函数计算行之间的差异。
column_menu.Add Space Between Word and Numbers: 在单词和数字之间添加空格
column_menu.Update Space Values to Empty String: 将空格值更新为空字符串
column_menu.Title: 标题

cleaning_descriptions.drop_multispace: 替换行中多个空格的序列，即 "foo bar">"foo bar"
cleaning_descriptions.stopwords: 通过在下面输入以逗号分隔的停止词字符串，从行中删除用户定义的停止词。
cleaning_descriptions.keep_alpha: 删除不属于标准字母或空格的字符，即 "BÀr. @123 foo" > "BÀrfoo"
cleaning_descriptions.normalize_accents: 将重音字与正常字规范化，即 "BÀr foö">"BAr foo'"
cleaning_descriptions.drop_all_space: 删除该行中的所有空格，即 "纽约" > "NewYork"
cleaning_descriptions.drop_repeated_words: 删除重复的词语，即 "柏林柏林#1234">"柏林#1234"
cleaning_descriptions.add_word_number_space: 在单词和/或数字之间加上空格，即 "柏林123">"柏林123"
cleaning_descriptions.drop_repeated_chars: 删除值中重复的字符，例如 "BBerlin">"Berlin"。
cleaning_descriptions.hidden_chars: 删除那些无法使用string.printable打印到屏幕的字符。
cleaning_descriptions.replace_hyphen_w_space: 用空格代替任何连字符（unicode或其他）。

duplicate.Remove columns that contain the same dat: 删除包含相同数据的列。
duplicate.Remove columns with the same name (case-: 删除同名列（不区分大小写）。
duplicate.Remove duplicate rows based on a subset: 根据列的子集删除重复的行。
duplicate.Show all duplicates data or duplicate da: 显示所有重复数据或特定值的重复数据。

upload.Drop data files here to upload, or click: 将数据文件放在这里上传，或点击选择文件。
